name: NiGHT SIGNAL
description:
Congratulations on your state-of-the-art Hinnikers Television set! You are ready to enter the wonderful world of televised programming! One word of warning however - Hinnikers brand televisions do not function properly after midnight.


Welcome To NiGHT SIGNAL.
Taking inspiration from The Twilight Zone and forgotten gems like The Dark Eye, NiGHT SIGNAL is a nightmarish first-person survival horror that sees you breaking in a new 1963 television set, only to find that it picks up strange signals after dark.

  • Watch strange, original programming in an alternate 1960's America using a state-of-the-art remote control.
  • Explore the confines of your small suburban home.
  • Uncover a strange narrative by tuning in at just the right moment.
  • Keep stop-motion horrors from escaping their domain.

Gee willikers, it must be a Hinnikers!
